name: Wedgieboy Adventure
description:
In Wedgie Boy you need to save the town from the boringness. Perform wedgies in public places and get famous.  Costumize your player as you want and explore different environments. Beware the Bullies that will put you into the trash bin. 

Test it out in browser:

Unity WebGL Player | WedgieBoyAdventure (masterbastian.github.io)
